response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is highly valued by its users. Given your interest and the quality of the product, I believe it would be a great fit for you. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $140 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only its worth but also provides you with an opportunity to acquire it at a competitive rate compared to market prices. I'm confident you'll find it to be a valuable investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 140}
